# Andrew Hellenthal

 

[City Council](https://www.jacksonvilleor.us/Directory.aspx?DID=13)  
Title: Council Member  
Phone: 615-812-4243  
[Email Andrew Hellenthal](mailto:councilorhellenthal@jacksonvilleor.us)

Serving on the Jacksonville City Council beginning November 2022. Prior to that, he served on the Jacksonville Historical Architectural Review Commission (HARC) for two years. 

Andrew's 35-year work experience spans across both public and private sectors in environmental planning and consulting. During this time, he had the pleasure of gaining a wide range of experiences in transportation planning and waste reduction programs to disaster and emergency response planning for cities. In the private sector, developing and implementing environmental compliance and due diligence programs; and conducting site investigation and remediation projects for national clients. This experience included both business operations management and being a technical subject matter expert. 

Andrew's educational background consists of having a Bachelor of Science degree from the University of Tennessee-Martin in Geoscience and a Master of Science degree in Geography and Planning from the University of Memphis.
